stepTitle: In an issue of U.S. News and World Report, an article on school standards stated that about half of all students in France, Germany, and Israel take advanced placement exams and a third pass. The same article stated that $$6.6\%$$ of U.S. students take advanced placement exams and $$4.4\%$$ pass. Test if the percentage of U.S. students who take advanced placement exams is more than $$6.6\%$$. State the null and alternative hypotheses. (p)
